column4: Hello! I'm trying to use Ubuntu with a PS2 keyboard, but the machine was set up for a USB keyboard. For some reason the PS2 keyboard works in BIOS but not the OS. Any ideas?
just downgraded. USB doesn't work in BIOS
Ah. I don't know. I do have PS2 keyboard. It have to be plugged in when you boot it up. I experienced no problems. Pretty much worked out of the box.
